effect.name: CIE Scope
effect.description: Display CIE color diagram with pixels overlaid onto it
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.size
Size
parameter.comment: Set the size of the scope on screen

parameter.name: av.intensity
Intensity
parameter.comment:
Set the intensity used to
map input pixel values to CIE diagram

parameter.name: av.contrast
Contrast
parameter.comment:
Set contrast used to draw
tongue colors that are out of active color system gamut

parameter.name: av.corrgamma
Display Correct Gamma
parameter.comment: Correct gamma displayed on scope, by default enabled

parameter.name: av.showwhite
Show White Point
parameter.comment: Show white point on CIE diagram, by default disabled

parameter.name: av.gamma
Input Gamma
parameter.comment: Set input gamma. Used only with XYZ input color space.

parameter.name: av.fill
Fill with CIE Colors
parameter.comment: Fill with CIE colors. By default is enabled.
